title: Worth the Fight
description: Luke Kessler loved Emmy.She broke his heart.Then she revealed a life altering secret that brought them back together. Time and forgiveness heal old wounds and love flourishes. Luke and Emmy find themselves reaching for a happily ever after together. When their pasts begin to push into their present and hurtful mistakes are made, the couple struggle with each other and their past demons. How much is too much? Will the couple be able to fight their way to a happily ever after? Are their lives together worth the fight?
author: L.D. Davis
